name: CraftCraft
description:
Entry for the Extra Credits "Cycles" Game Jam

Made by Trevor Westphal and Chris Rice

HINTS:
Write down combinations as they come

Use the refresh button to start a puzzle over

The "Star" tile dismantles tiles when used

Sounds from FreeSound.org

Textures from Textures.com

Thanks to A.C. and M.G. for testing and feedback
